mapper.sql: SELECT p.*, a.id AS account_id, a.user_id AS account_user_id, a.sn AS account_sn, a.domain AS account_domain, a.name AS account_name, a.type AS account_type, a.status AS account_status, a.created_at AS account_created_at, a.updated_at AS account_updated_at, h.id AS host_id, h.name AS host_name, h.address AS host_address, h.capacity AS host_capacity, h.status AS host_status, h.configuration AS host_configuration , h.description AS host_description , h.created_at AS host_created_at, h.updated_at AS host_updated_at, s.id AS schema_id, s.host_id AS schema_host_id, s.name AS schema_name, s.configuration AS schema_configuration , s.description AS schema_description , s.created_at AS schema_created_at, s.updated_at AS schema_updated_at FROM itsnow_processes p JOIN itsnow_hosts h ON p.host_id = h.id JOIN itsnow_schemas s ON p.schema_id = s.id JOIN accounts a ON p.account_id = a.id
